original_text: And Jonathan rose from the table in fierce anger and ate no food the second day of the month, for he was grieved for David, because his father had disgraced him.
korean_text: 심히 노하여 식탁에서 떠나고 그 달의 둘째 날에는 먹지 아니하였으니 이는 그의 아버지가 다윗을 욕되게 하였으므로 다윗을 위하여 슬퍼함이었더라

sentences.original_text: And Jonathan rose from the table
the second day of the month
for he was grieved for David
because his father had disgraced him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지가 그를 부끄럽게 했기 때문이다
